snippet: A new prime minister has taken office in Haiti as the country enters a period of political uncertainty after the dissolution of Parliament because of a stalemate between lawmakers and the president.
abstract: Prime Min Evans Paul assumes office in Haiti; change comes during period of political instability following dissolution of nation's Parliament.
lead_paragraph: A new prime minister has taken office in Haiti as the country enters a period of political uncertainty after the dissolution of Parliament because of a stalemate between lawmakers and the president.

headline.main: Haiti: Broad Uncertainty as New Premier Takes Office
headline.print_headline: Haiti: Broad Uncertainty as New Premier Takes Office
